meanings.definition: A buoyant board used for support in swimming.
meanings.sent1: At the pool, children practice floating with kickboards.
meanings.sent2: Swimmers at the beach often use kickboards to help them stay afloat.
meanings.sent3: The kickboard decided to take a break and relax in the sun instead of helping swimmers.
meanings.sent4: The kickboard became a superhero, rescuing struggling swimmers in the deep waters.
meanings.sent5: The bright orange kickboard bobbed gently on the calm surface of the pool.

meanings.definition: A board used for kicking in water exercises.
meanings.sent1: During water aerobics class, participants kick vigorously with kickboards.
meanings.sent2: Athletes in training often incorporate kickboards into their swimming workouts.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kickboard played a prank by splashing water on the instructor during class.
meanings.sent4: The kickboard transformed into a magic carpet, propelling swimmers through the pool effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out kickboard showed signs of frequent use with its faded color and scratches.
